annotation.spannedText: Knowing which vaccines you need is an important step toward protecting your health and that of your family and friends

classMention.mentionClass: Knowing which vaccines you need is an important step toward protecting your health and that of your family and friends

annotation.spannedText: Getting vaccines on time helps prevent illness before you’re exposed

classMention.mentionClass: Getting vaccines on time helps prevent illness before you’re exposed

annotation.spannedText: Talk with your health care provider about the vaccines that might be recommended for your age, health status, and lifestyle

classMention.mentionClass: Talk with your health care provider about the vaccines that might be recommended for your age, health status, and lifestyle

annotation.spannedText: To learn about situations in which you should wait to receive a vaccine or shouldn’t receive one, check the Vaccine Information Statement (VIS) for the particular vaccine you need

classMention.mentionClass: To learn about situations in which you should wait to receive a vaccine or shouldn’t receive one, check the Vaccine Information Statement (VIS) for the particular vaccine you need

annotation.spannedText: They are constructed to be as safe and as convenient as possible, without requiring unnecessary visits to your doctor or health care provider

classMention.mentionClass: They are constructed to be as safe and as convenient as possible, without requiring unnecessary visits to your doctor or health care provider

annotation.spannedText: Find out which vaccines you may need at different times of life by reading about your age or health condition below

classMention.mentionClass: Find out which vaccines you may need at different times of life by reading about your age or health condition below

annotation.spannedText: Vaccine schedules are designed with you in mind

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccine schedules are designed with you in mind

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinating your child is one of the most important steps you can take to protect their health and future

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinating your child is one of the most important steps you can take to protect their health and future

annotation.spannedText: The childhood vaccine schedule designed to be as safe and as convenient as possible, and to protect children when they are at highest risk of complications from disease

classMention.mentionClass: The childhood vaccine schedule designed to be as safe and as convenient as possible, and to protect children when they are at highest risk of complications from disease

annotation.spannedText: Help protect your child’s health by learning about the vaccines they need and being sure to get the pre-teen and teenage vaccines on time

classMention.mentionClass: Help protect your child’s health by learning about the vaccines they need and being sure to get the pre-teen and teenage vaccines on time

annotation.spannedText: If your child did not get these vaccines at age 11 or 12, schedule an appointment to get them now

classMention.mentionClass: If your child did not get these vaccines at age 11 or 12, schedule an appointment to get them now

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are an important part of preventive care throughout life

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are an important part of preventive care throughout life

annotation.spannedText: If your child is behind on his or her vaccines, don’t worry – they can get caught up on all the recommended vaccines at any age

classMention.mentionClass: If your child is behind on his or her vaccines, don’t worry – they can get caught up on all the recommended vaccines at any age

annotation.spannedText: Review the Child Catch-up schedule and speak with your doctor to learn how to get your child safely back on track

classMention.mentionClass: Review the Child Catch-up schedule and speak with your doctor to learn how to get your child safely back on track

annotation.spannedText: Read More Young adulthood often means increased independence, changes, and responsibilities

classMention.mentionClass: Read More Young adulthood often means increased independence, changes, and responsibilities

annotation.spannedText: Learn more about the vaccines are specifically recommended for young adults ages 19-24

classMention.mentionClass: Learn more about the vaccines are specifically recommended for young adults ages 19-24

annotation.spannedText: Whether a college student, middle-aged adult, or senior citizen, all adults need immunizations to keep them and their families healthy

classMention.mentionClass: Whether a college student, middle-aged adult, or senior citizen, all adults need immunizations to keep them and their families healthy

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines for older adults can prevent serious diseases and even death

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines for older adults can prevent serious diseases and even death

annotation.spannedText: Immunizations are not just for kids

classMention.mentionClass: Immunizations are not just for kids

annotation.spannedText: They can also help prevent the spread of disease through your family and community

classMention.mentionClass: They can also help prevent the spread of disease through your family and community

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines can help keep you and your growing family healthy

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines can help keep you and your growing family healthy

annotation.spannedText: If you are pregnant or planning a pregnancy, the specific vaccinations you need are determined by factors such as your age, lifestyle, high-risk conditions, type and locations of travel, and previous vaccinations

classMention.mentionClass: If you are pregnant or planning a pregnancy, the specific vaccinations you need are determined by factors such as your age, lifestyle, high-risk conditions, type and locations of travel, and previous vaccinations

annotation.spannedText: Talk with your health care provider and learn more about the vaccines recommended for your age, health status, and lifestyle, especially if you have a chronic or serious health condition
